sentences.en: Although he was very nervous, he put on a brave front.

sentences.en: Charles was brave and remarkably good-humoured.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯很勇敢而且脾气也特别好。

sentences.en: Despite their captain’s brave performance, Arsenal lost 2–1.
sentences.cn: 尽管队长表现出色，但阿森纳队还是以1比2告负。

sentences.en: He felt disappointed but he tried to put on a brave face.
sentences.cn: 他感到很失望，但还竭力强装欢笑。

sentences.en: He felt no fear, for he was very brave.
sentences.cn: 他很勇敢,毫不畏惧.

sentences.cn: 她与癌症的勇敢搏斗

sentences.en: I couldn't decide whether he was incredibly brave or just insane.
sentences.cn: 我不能判定他到底是英勇无畏还是精神失常。

sentences.en: I know she's unhappy, all her brave talk to the contrary.
sentences.cn: 我知道她是不幸的, 尽管她嘴上逞强.

sentences.en: I think it was very brave of him to tough it out.
sentences.cn: 我认为他坚持到底非常勇敢。

sentences.en: It was brave of him to enter the burning building.
sentences.cn: 他进了那个失火的大楼,真有勇气.

sentences.en: Sometimes I am not as brave as I should be.
sentences.cn: 有时我表现得不够勇敢。

sentences.en: The bodyguards, as usual, were brave but oafish.
sentences.cn: 这些保镖照旧勇气可嘉但鲁钝无礼。

sentences.en: To call a brave man a coward is an insult.
sentences.cn: 把勇士称为懦夫是一种侮辱.

sentences.en: We ought to face the world and brave the storm.
sentences.cn: 我们应该经风雨,见世面.

sentences.en: You have done a brave act and you will hear about it.
sentences.cn: 你干了一件勇敢的事,你将会受到奖赏的.

sentences.en: You're brave and courageous. You can make it.
sentences.cn: 你勇敢无畏，一定会获得成功。
